name: Hit and Run
overview: For all cricket fans, Sunday league cricket for your 64. One or Two player games allows you to captain and select your team in a 40 overs innings match. 30 players available for selection which offers literally million of permutations. Conditions vary from match to match. Includes run-outs, wides, no-balls, byes and leg-byes. Man of the match decision at end of each match. Captain of batting side has the opportunity to adjust his tactics at intervals of 7 overs or at the fall of a wicket. The captain of the fielding side can adjust his tactics at the end of each over. As in Sunday league cricket bowlers are limited to 8 overs and may not bowl two successive overs. Batsmen improve as their innings grows whereas fatigue can make bowlers and fielders less effective. A very addictive game, excellently written by David T. Coates. A must for all cricket fans.
